title: Pakistan Secondary Teacher Professional Development Program Design Based on Cultural Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical concepts and multicultural understanding experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning designing cultural competency enhancement and teacher professional development programs through understanding Pakistan’s educational context

learning_goals: Students can analyze and explain at least three core characteristics of Pakistani educational culture using a cultural competency assessment tool.
Students can design a teaching methodology draft applying intercultural communication strategies and improve it by over 80% based on peer feedback.
Students can propose at least two teacher professional development models while performing team-based projects in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
